original_text: But among these there was not one of those listed by Moses and Aaron the priest, who had listed the people of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
korean_text: 모세와 제사장 아론이 시내 광야에서 계수한 이스라엘 자손은 한 사람도 들지 못하였으니

sentences.original_text: there was not one of those listed
sentences.korean_translation: 등록된 사람 중에 한 사람도 없었다

sentences.original_text: by Moses and Aaron the priest
who had listed the people of Israel
